# 调试项目

## 0. 添加位置表

```
CREATE TABLE `location` (
  `epc` varchar(30) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `cabinet` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `location` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=101 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3;
```



## 1. 测试客户端连接

客户端连接tcp服务器

> nc localhost 8086

## 2. 测试心跳

> %start%{"order": "heart","number": "12345678123456781234567812345678","code": "1","data": ""}%end%

## 3. 指纹添加/指纹删除

## 4. 测试权限获取

- 账号密码

> %start%{"order":"power","number":"12345678123456781234567812345678","code":"1","type":"3","data":"wangbing+123456"}%end%

- 指纹

> %start%{"order":"power","number":"12345678123456781234567812345678","code":"1","type":"1","data":""}%end%

- 刷卡

> %start%{"order":"power","number":"12345678123456781234567812345678","code":"1","type":"2","data":"111"}%end%

## 4. 指纹添加/指纹删除

## 5. 耗材上报

> %start%{"order":"product","number":"12345678123456781234567812345678","code":"1","operator":"0001","data":[{"location":"1","data":["474B48540000000000000001","474B48540000000000000002","474B48540000000000000949"]}]}%end%

## 6. 耗材统计

> %start%{"order":"total","number":"12345678123456781234567812345678","code":"1","operator":"0001","data":[{"location":"1","data":["474B48540000000000000001","474B48540000000000000002"]},{"location":"2","data":["474B48540000000000000003","474B48540000000000000004"]},{"location":"3","data":["474B48540000000000000005","474B48540000000000000006"]},{"location":"4","data":["474B48540000000000000619","474B48540000000000000664"]},{"location":"5","data":["474B48540000000000000974","11"]}]}%end%
